body:
Well I was thinking, since people are always comparing servers via pvp skills, community etc... Why not building?!?

My idea is that comparable servers like The Chunk, Avicus, OCN etc... would elect their best builders. Once all server's builders are ready, they would have 1 week to complete the best possible build they can. This would NOT have to be a PvP map, although it could be if you wanted, it would be to see who has the best detailing/depth and overall building skills! Whoever would win could basically be like "yey i kewl like .... wowwww".
So yeah, no prizes :3
